function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor coverage in 1g technology","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low sound quality in 1g technology","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of roaming support capacity in 1g technology","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation related to the proliferation of social media and connectivity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of digitally connected iot devices in smart cities can lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through these devices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased connectivity and interaction in smart cities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on private corporations for smart city development","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on new technologies and digital platforms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited community engagement and participation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid technological innovation in response to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global cooperation and governance challenges in the face of corporate influence","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocalised centres and decentralized work environments may lead to increased population density in these areas, posing a risk of contagion and rapid disease spread.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot platforms and smart devices for data connectivity creates a potential security risk, as these systems are vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monopolistic introduction of unique iot devices by corporations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expensive infrastructure investment due to multiple device platforms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unavailability of supportive technological infrastructure, including network connectivity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High implementation costs leading to abandonment or refocusing of the smart city pursuit","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited wireless communication leading to expensive infrastructural costs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased domestic internet use leading to potential spread of contagious diseases through shared devices and networks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major decline in fixed office internet access leading to increased reliance on shared public wi-fi networks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of 5g and potential future transition to 6g increasing connectivity and data transfer speeds.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased interaction between iot devices and humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and resistance to iot-based data collection for healthcare monitoring","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on ai technology for health data analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased movement and interaction of people and wildlife as a result of optimized location awareness and autonomous transportation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services facilitated by 6g technology could result in potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data privacy risks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of intelligent wearable devices iwd and remote healthcare technologies powered by 6g may lead to challenges in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of health data collected from individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in least developed countries ldcs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented interest and increase in wearable devices and smart body implants","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive availability and utilization of data in urban environments through 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through urban areas due to rapid population growth and increased global connectivity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical presence in real-time operations may lead to delayed or inadequate response to health and safety hazards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote operation and monitoring may lead to increased risk of contagion spread if proper health and safety measures are not implemented","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to fragile or toxic ores and chemicals can pose health risks in the absence of proper monitoring and control","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of project impacts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g model without thorough impact assessment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and increasing the risk of mental health issues and social isolation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
